'''Notes'''
Wifi started to work in latest 10.10 release (it didn't in 10.04). WebCam started to work after kernel upgrade to 2.6.35-30-generic #56-Ubuntu SMP Mon Jul 11 20:00:22 UTC 2011 i686. 3D graphic hibernate works out of the box. Simplo USB Webcam is recognised as:
